content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on the evening of the 24th at 1820 cst. i was stuck in traffic and looked up and there was a stationary large object hovering and glowing. i instantly called a friend and asked if he saw it abou ten miles away. he also saw it and said it was stationary. at this time i was look up through my sun roof and passing under the thing and it was silent and high up. then a very low flying grey aircraft flew over and was also very quiet. my friend then informed me because i had to pay attention to the road that there were helicopters circling it.
content.summary: Something was floating then low flying military jets and helicopters all invoked were almost silent

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on my deck in livermore maine. looking at stars, when one brightened
and acended at about a 45 degree angle. object did this about 20 secs. then turned
to left fast. object falded in color, then turned red and disappeared.  during this
i was amased at the movement and color. it looked just like a star, until it moved.
during and after i lost site, i also felt very weak and off balance. very weird 
expirence.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White star like object acended and turned red disappeared?

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving rite aid in westbrook, maine. i turned left onto to main st. as i was heading from the store, i looked up and saw a large, bright, white light flying in a se to nw direction. i made myself look at the clock, it was 7:00pm sharp. i saw a helicopter or plane with blinking lights head toward the white orb. it immediately backed off to the nw. 

i then took a left by the police station. then a right onto wayside dr. i saw two men at the intersection looking up at it too. i then headed toward spring st. after that the craft started to descend down like a leaf falling slowly. it stayed the same intense, bright, white light. once i reached the spring st. intersection i lost sight of it. i pulled into my driveway and tried to record it on my cell phone. it was still there flying, i was now facing e..It was flying  in a ne to se direction. i looked around the sky and saw a few planes in the area. then just as quick as i could blink it was gone. vanished into a pinpoint of light then nothing. i think i saw a fighter jet, a plane with lights but a steady and a steady orange glowing on the rear. i heard a jet fly over. to me the white light from my perspective was the size of a basketball flying over the town.

my recording is crappy but i have it. i know that was not the norm. has anyone else reported seeing this. i dont know how they couldnt see it.
content.summary: Large white ball of light flying flying se to sw, then desecended, then took off

content.detailedDescription: I was up because spanky (my dog) was starting to get sick and after he did, i took him outside so he can go to the bathroom. i noticed that the moon was bright and the sky was very clear at that time. i also noticed another bright object to the left of the moon (looking at the pic) and close, so when we went inside i used droid sky view to see what it was, and i do not remember the name at this time, sorry. i took a picture as close as i could of both the moon and the other object together. it wasn't until 2 days later when i looked at the picture again that i noticed something to the right of the moon (if you are looking at the picture) and another 2 objects below the moon, one of them is a little above the 2 in 2013.
content.summary: Was taking a picture of the moon and another star when i noticed other objects.

content.detailedDescription: Giant, format boomerang, the stars could be seen through it.
content.summary: Boomerang,

content.detailedDescription: What i thought was a satellite, only it was too big, too bright , and moving too quick, from east to se quickly. it then just disappeared, yet all the stars around it were still bright. (no cloud) perhaps it changed direction?
content.summary: What i thought was a bright huge satellite seemed too large and the movement was to fast, there was a dull red light below object, it then disappeared. not behind a night cloud, as all the stars there were still bright.(perhaps changed direction.)

content.detailedDescription: While traveling south early morning,i saw bright white light that flashed like a welding arc as it traveled across the sky in front of me. it soon came to a dead stop in the sky where it stayed until it was out of my view.I was unable to stop to investigate as i was on on my way to work.
content.summary: Bright white light that flashed like an welding arc

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my front yard smoking a cig when i noticed there was several bright lights in different locations in the sky. i have noticed these lights for quite a few months. i looked through my binoculars and noticed different colors flashing on and off. they move from side to side and back and forth and then go back to the same area that i first noticed.They seem to be very high up in the atmosphere. i also observe lower objects that flash and move all over the sky. i have also seen these objects during the day. when it's clear weather they seem to have a cloud or mist like shroud around them. inside these shrouds i sometimes see a round circle of light with a cross shape in the circle. they move all over the sky doing sumersalt like moves and also they move in different patterns such as octagon or zig zag or square. i sometimes think they are trying to communicate some mathematical signal. i also observe during the day that they sometimes eject many little light, circle shaped objects with dark circles in their centers. . they are dark and shiny objects that move very eradic around each other. on cloudy days you can see them better moving through the clouds. i have had several witnesses seeing the same objects as i do. i would like to note that i did see an orange orb that was around a foot or two above the ground moving very fast go by my feet and around a telephone pole in a 45 degree turn and then disappear.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was standing in my front yard when i noticed a bright light that was moving back and forth and side by side

content.detailedDescription: Witness saw 10-12 objects going in straight line but not all grouped together. came from se heading to nw. witness saw 1 object later and it went behind the trees. never came out from behind trees. 1 hour later saw another object much like others in the nw.
content.summary: 10-12 orange objects flying in straight line

content.detailedDescription: Additional info for this case:  the trees in question that the "snake-like" rope-light landed on (and subsequently burst into what could be described as "intense fireworks"?), has apparent burned-looking, shriveled up leaves on it where this light landed.  it literally appears that these leaves were baked on the limb.  in addition, there is a broken branch hanging down in the middle of these dead-looking leaves.  the mufon investigator called, and was informed of this immediately after the sighting, and we were asked to take photos of the tree.  photos have been taken, but without a professional camera, it really doesn't do it justice.  if anyone at mufon is interested in investigating it further, we would still be very interested in finding out what in the world.....(or not) it was. leaves are falling fast, however..............Not included crappy photos taken with cell phone....As it is very difficult to see. this is one of those "you have to see it to believe it" things..........
content.summary: Additional info case # 48271; log #us-06202013-0006; submitted 6/20/2013

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work, alone in my car, driving south. noticed the object to my left as i was looking over the valley. did not have an idea of what it was, my thought was 'what's that?'. the object was cylinder shape, green in color and appeared to glow. it seemed to have a spiked surface. it moved silently in a straight line, heading south. i watched it (about 1 min.) while i drove along the road until i needed to make a right-hand turn onto the road that i lived on. our home was on a hillside about 1/2 mile from where i was when i saw it. while i watched it, i thought it was pretty cool and was curious about what it was. when i arrived at home, my daughter (13) and her female friend who had been climbing a tree in our front yard, came running over to me, very excited and told me that they had seen a green light over the hills, moving across the sky. i told them that i had seen it too and we talked about it for a few minutes, that we had seen a ufo. we then shifted our attention to dinner and the plans for the evening. we did not talk about it much after that but mention it from time to time as a very neat experience.
content.summary: Saw object above the hills while driving home in afternoon on a fall day.

content.detailedDescription:
1. walking with me and my girlfriend to my car to go shopping at 20h50ish.
2. a big white boomerang flying in the sky... what the f**k is that i said loudly.
3. not a plane, not a delta plane, not a swamp gaz, probably not batman as well.
4. it just moved somehow fast, 1min and it was out of sigh, just moved in a straight line somehow low to the ground could barely see the shape and object, very gloomy.
5. point it to my girl friend, she couldnt see, her vision very bad without glass from far.
6. too far, faded in the darkness of the after dusk.
content.summary: White shaped-boomerang gloomey ufo fly almost over me and my girl friend, she couldnt saw it, glasses in the house.

content.detailedDescription:
Since january 2013  in sweet home oregon i have been noticing a circular apparition in the sky to the west which i could visibly see with the naked eye was pulsating and changing colors. when i used my digital camera to maybe get a better shot and was surprised to see and capture color.Because it was in the winter months i could not see it anymore.
on october 21st i went outside to look at the full moon to the west and noticed the color changing orb seemed very bright and much closer then before so i enlarged the picture and clearly could see it moving and changing colors!! i turned towards the east to look at the full moon and spotted another one above the treeline under the moon but as i surveyed the sky there were more!! i don`t have a movie feature on my camera but i took bursts that clearly shows the object moving, changing color and blue orb looking things seem to always be near although not seen with the naked eye. this has been happening up until last night . 
if i only had a better camera!!! mine is a panasonic lumix micro . i have more information if interested.I have believed in ufo`s since i was a little kid, i would love to know more of what`s really happening :)i have many more pictures and a better one showing the colore changing orb seemingly either giving or taking energy from a blue one.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several circular entities moving and changing colors, dissapearing and appearing, blue dots near or absorbing energy from ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, my name is [name removed/cms/tg], i am a church pastor, scholar, historian, and practicing ufologist.
 i have a video (vhs) of a ufo sighting (it's a very compelling & authentic video of a live ufo hovering over my house at night!)
that i witnessed & recorded back in 1996. i think that this video would interest you, and your colleagues, very much! i have been sitting on this, looking for someone to show it to, for quite some time, i hope you are the guys who want to see this evidence first hand!!
i would appreciate you contacting me soon..
content.summary: A glowing ball

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo over salt lake city - flashing bright color lights - oct 23, 2013

in the western sky from hollday, ut 84124, i videotaped over an hour of this very bright and far away object, from 7:30 pm to 8:30 pm it was approximately where i usually see venus in the night sky. it rotatated out of frame like a planet. a party at the black diamond center provided the background and music.
content.summary: Star brightly changing colors red, blue, white etc. for over an hour

content.detailedDescription: It was a weekend i was around 9 yrs old im 41 now i remember like it was yesterday i live in a three bed room house have one little  sister and one older bother my strep father was a deputy sheriff at the time every night i would check the doors and windows to make sure they were locked my brother and sister were already sleep and parents but i couldnt sleep and i herd the police k9 burking in the garage so i check all the doors and the windows in my brother and sister room went to check mine and there it was when opened my carton looking right at me with ovel eyes head shaped like a egg with big eyes and a skinny neck i scream and scream looking at it as it noded it head left to right i shut the window carton and my father and mother ran in the bedroom and ask me whats wrong i told them its something in my window and they went to my window and open the carton and it was gone so they said i must of beening dreaming are scene a owl and i kept telling them what i seen and the k9 was still barking so my step father grab his gun and called his sheriff buddies and they came over and grab the k9 out the garage and checked around the house they checked outside my window and the little tree outside my window was smash like if something just step on it so his sherrif buddies left and my step father put the dog back in the garage and he came in and told me no more screaming and if i do ill get a whooping and told me to go lay in the front room on the coach so thats what i did than it had to be about 3are4 in the morning while laying on the coach you could see the kitchen window i was so scared i layed on the coach after my step dad cut the lights off and went back into his room and everybody went back to sleep but me i took one look toward the kitchen window and there it was again looking right at me miving its head back and fourth i was so scared to yell i ferd i would get in trouble and get a whooping and no one would believe me so i put the cover over my head a layed still like if i were sleep hoping it would go away than after awhile i felt like it was spider webs going around me feet and up towards my weist and than neck i closed my eyes so scared to move felt like i was  rap in a  cocoon some how i was sleep woke uo in the morning my mother found me on the kitchen floor by the window with no cover are clothes with a mark on my weist line my mother said what was i doing in the kitchenon the floor sleep with no cover no clothes and i said i dont no than she took me to the doctor and the asked her have i ever had sirgery and my mother said no so they had me lay on a table trying to figure out how i got a line so perfect like a laser cut and at the tme i dont think the doctors had that kind of tecnowelegy was around so they asked so many question but couldnt figur out how did i get that perfect line below my waist but it didnt hurt so we left the hospital and i went to stay with my grandmother my mother took me to another doctor i believe a syciatric doctor and they told her theres nothing wrong with me and what ever i seen it was something and im very bright and to listen to me because i seen something so that was the last of it and mother and step father in a couple more years they seperated and my mother moved alot everytime people would call asking about me she would move and when i got grown i notice strange things happening around me i would be driving and at night i would look at the stars and one paticular star seems to be coming close and i made sure it wasnt a plane are helecoptor it followed me from one side of the city to the other side it just hoverd a bright light i seen it night after night for about 5 are 6 months i was around 35yrs of age but i kept it to my self
content.summary: It came to my house and made contact

content.detailedDescription:
I was around 10 years old. my friend billy and i where sitting on our neighbors old couch that was out in the street for trash pickup.
we were throwing broken crayons we found between the couch cushions at the house and hiding behind the couch when the porch light would turn on. (kids)

anyway, i noticed what i thought was a plane in the sky that was very low, but i was not interested in it because i saw planes all the time in that area. what got my attention was that it was rotating very slowly back and forth. not rolling, like a plane but turning on an axis. the lights seemed to change the shape from triangle to kind of a strait line.
i nudged my buddy and said "look" he looked for 2 seconds and said "its just a plane" and i said "no look, its turning on its side" so he finally looked and we both watched not understanding what it was. so we ran over to our bikes and tried to get closer. the object moved slowly away from us and if we stopped, it would stop. it was just above the treeline and then started to move upward, very slowly. we chased/followed the object all the way from block street, and merriman to the k-mart parking lot which was several blocks away. many people in the parking lot saw the object and the planes that where circling it. you could see the blinking lights of the planes around the object and here the sound of helicopters. this lasted around 15 mins and the object moved out of sight and the planes followed. the next night i waited in my living room, hoping to see the object again. around 8 or 9 pm,it appeared right above the trees from the night before. so i got on my bike and tried to get closer. again the object moved as i moved. i had to go to school the next day so i could not follow for too long. so the third night i waited again, and the object came back, my mother happened to wake up to use the bathroom, so i grabbed her by the arm and drug her out to the porch, and told her to look in the sky, she didn't see it at first so i pointed and she said "that's a plane" i told her "no, look at it.. its turning upside down" she watched and put her hand over her mouth, and said "what is that?" i said "it comes out every night at this time over the trees, but i can never get close enough to see what it looks like" she put her hand on my shoulder and said "we should get inside" "why?" i replied. she said "because i don't feel safe out here".
i went to my room and hoped i would see it again, but unfortunately i did not. the event was in the detroit free-press, and the statement was something about an out of orbit satellite. i know for a fact that hundreds of people saw this object. it wasn't until years later i saw an old hbo documentary on ufo's that showed sightings where air-force planes where scrambled during the same period for 3 consecutive occasions in michigan around the same time that summer years earlier and i remembered what had happened. it has been on my mind ever since.
i have tried to find information on this event with no luck. 
maybe someone else has described the same thing around that time.
thanks.
content.summary: 3-4 lights that changed configuration while rotating

content.detailedDescription: While on a drive to st. johns with a sibling and a close family friend in the car the following took place: it was approximately 2:00 am several years back. we were heading toward st johns from the northwest travelling colony road. roughly half to three-quarters of a mile from the krepps road intersection i observed a football or egg shaped object streak across the sky  and out of sight in a matter of seconds. it was a vivid green and appeared to leave a trail behind, more a streak of light behind the object due to it's incredible speed. i abruptly stopped the car and asked my passengers what if they had seen the object. they were looking the opposite direction and had only a sense of a brief greenish light. i was shaken by what i had seen and the fact that they apparently hadn't seen the object (and quite possibly questioned my sanity) or didn't want to or weren't able to comprehend what they had seen. imagine looking out your driver window, seeing a glowing green football shape appear out of nowhere then streak across the sky and out of sight at an amazing speed. i have had other mysterious sightings but this one stands etched into my memory. i don't know what i saw but know it was not a conventional aircraft or natural phenomenon.
content.summary: High velocity unknown object

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went to the lexington cemetery, which is on the national register of historic places, on may 15, 2013, just before 1:00 p.M.  it's beautiful there with gardens and lakes and the cemetery is heavily treed.  i chose for us to go there so i could take some portrait photographs of my husband with the gardens in the background. i know the date and time because of the "stamp" on the photographs i took of my husband just afterward.  

we were slowly driving down the main road through the cemetery and entered an area where the trees are sparse when i happened to look up.  for only a few seconds, i saw an object in the sky that appeared to be stationary, nearly directly above us and before i could react, we were back under the canopy of trees.  i yelled for my husband to stop the car but he was on his cell phone and took his time stopping.  i got out and walked back to the spot where i thought i'd seen the object but i never saw it again.

the object was very white, matte with no sheen at all, and was cylinder-shaped with a cone-like front or back end on it.  there were two dark "lines" encircling the main body that were either painted on or perhaps the object was comprised of three sections and i was seeing where the sections joined each other.  i heard no sound from it and there was no vapor trail or lights.

the sky was clear and very blue that spring day and the whiteness of the object really popped against the sky. i saw it vividly.  it appeared to actually be stationary.  i only saw it for a few seconds and though it seemed to not be moving, it may have been moving very slowly.

i was very stunned when i saw it because it defied logic and made no sense to me.  it was like nothing i'd ever seen.  i was extremely frustrated with my husband because he seemed to have no reaction at all to what i had seen and what i was telling him.  in fact, he continued to talk on his cell phone while i was rushing up and down the roadway trying to find the object again.  although he believed me, he never had much of a reaction other than to tease me about it.  at the time it happened, i immediately got out a piece of paper and drew the object to show him and to keep for myself.  i thought about it a lot for several days or a week and the memory still comes back to me often.  i guess the mind keeps trying to make sense of mysteries like this because they are so extraordinary and unexplainable. by the way, i attach no significance to this siting being over a cemetery.  it just happened to be where i was when i spotted it.
content.summary: Saw object hovering low and overhead during the day.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside around 9:15 pm last night trying to film in the dark when my dogs started barking and alerted me to what appeared to be a rather slowly descending fireball.  it was at a distance of about 1 mile from where i was standing and descended into the beginning of the gunnison gorge area in the western slope region of colorado.  when it got to about 25 feet above the river it exploded, sending out 2 or 3 streaks of glitter which also then exploded.  on the video you can see the light descending above the 5 stationary street lights from the electric company's service building.  then the 1st flash is visible to the right of those lights, followed by 2 more flashes.  thought the explosions were rather odd for a fireball.
unfortunately i'm recording with my $59 camera from newegg so it's not very clear since it was quite dark last night but the skies were very clear (as usual) and starry.  you can see the light descending at an angle above the 5 street lights.  it vanishes to the right of those lights, then there's a bright flash, followed by 2 more flashes.
the region it fell into is the upper end of the black canyon on the gunnison river and is river/desert surrounded on both sides by steep cliffs.  it lit-up the area as it descended, but not enough for the camera to pick it up.
content.summary: Observed a fireball slowly descending until it exploded about 25 feet above the ground/river

content.detailedDescription:
Good day,
i have a question; has anyone figured out what ���foo fighters��� are? because back in 1985 or 86 me and 2 others went camping in the wind river mountains about 50 miles s.E. of pinedale, wy. 8,600ft. up.We had just got there and setting up camp got a fire going when i saw a ball of light or fire not sure what it was heading away from us on an angle when it was like ���hey someone���s over there��� it turned came straight at me and stopped like 6 or 8 feet from my face and sat there for to me seemed like 10 to 15 seconds then shot straight up no it was not ball lighting. 
i told my story to a neighbor here in clark, wy. and he said he saw the same thing a few years ago here in clark so i know they are real but what are they?  

i have experienced and seen so many things from the age of 7 and now 61 to know something is not right. things that some people think are just made up scifi stuff are real!!! very real i would love a chance to go on national television and take a polygraph in front of the world and tell my stories but i found that no one cares really no one cares about the things i have seen and experienced. o���well
content.summary: A ball of light flying over tree tops then came right at me.

content.detailedDescription: Me encontraba frente a mi casa cuando me fije al cielo y vi este objeto redondosobre volando a baja altura, busque mi camara y le tome varias fotos se veia conpletamente metalico esto ocurrio como a las 1300 hr.Su movimiento era rapido y en angulos.En un principio me senti como que incredulo de lo que estaba viendo, pero luego de ver las foto y los hacercamiento vi que esra real y no un espejismo o una jagaretea de mi imaginacion.
content.summary: Era un obeto circular metalico y de movimientos rapidos.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside letting my dog back in for the night when i noticed a large basketball size bright orb high above the hilltop.  the one thing that was odd to me is that it was so large and i have seen many jets out here at night, helicopters, small planes as we are about 10 miles from a small airport and about 2 miles from a local hospital where it is common for helicopters to fly over our house enroute to the hospital.  i have seen venus and saturn before and it was three times the size and brightness.  i talked to my sister a few minutes later after i went back in and she stated she was seeing the same exact thing (she lives 11 miles from me) and it was the same size i described yet she specifically saw a red tail like a red light that was attached to the back.  i did not see that.  we both watched it from our homes trying to figure out if it was a comet, yet it did not come closer nor get brighter, it hovered right where it was, stayed the same color with no pulsating, no sound emitting from it, nothing.  the pets weren't behaving any differently either.  i didn't have any phone interruption, i was on a landline, she on a cell phone.  as we watched it over the course of the next few minutes, it slowly seemed to distance itself, and become dimmer and dimmer.  the only explanation i could think of was maybe it could have been a very large star that died?  as it got dimmer and the more farther away it got, the more it slowly descended to just below the treetops and then i lost sight of it over the hill.  i can't explain it being a satellite, it definitely was not a plane or helicopter nor was it a meteor as i have observed them before.  i was just astounded because i have never seen anything behave like that before and i was searching the internet to see if anything had been sighted last night because i would really like to know what it is.  hopefully this report will prompt someone else to come forward if they saw it and report their observations.
content.summary: Bright orb of white light, stayed stationary for about an hour and a half; seemed to descend to just a little below the tree lines after an hour and dimmed as it seemed to get smaller

content.detailedDescription:
We live extreme rual south ms, ground zero tatum salt dome test sight of the bombs dropped on heroshema. we die 2 ways accidents and cancer. this dome leaks radiation and assorted poisons. the dome attracts them.
 this is my story told by myself of a mass sightng of a ufo by my family, it was on the ground. we were having a baby shower uskids were outside playing. i noticed what i called airport lights in the field. i sat there and watched for 20 minites or ao before i showed mycousins. we all played and watched  the red lights. no sound no movement no reason to fear it. we gotourparents who stood there with their eyes glued to it. after a few minutes it staeted going up...Slow and quiet. it got high in thesky and ..It hit gone speed straight up...We all left that house quiet and wenthome.
content.summary: At a family babyshower in back woods ms. mass sighting near tatum salt dome...Test sight for bomb dropped on heroshema. i was the first to see it, it was sitting in a cow pasture behind the house. "they" come because of the salt dome radiation leaks.

content.detailedDescription:
I got up at 7am and went into the garden for a smoke. as i sat down i noticed 2 orrangy, yellow flame like shapes in the sky. i did not know what i was looking at but thought it was odd. i had never seen anything like that before. they looked like 2 big flames of fire in the sky. they came down below the roof of the house in front of ours so i did not see what happened to them. about 5-10 minutes later i was in the kitchen and looked out of the window still wondering what it was i had seen and i looked up to see another 3 flame like shapes coming down and one seemed to changed direction. i quickly took a photo on my phone of this event, however, my phone is not an expensive one and although it captured the things, it did not show the colour of them and they were as i said like flames yellowy orange in colour and i could see a trail of smoke behind them. i am reporting this now, as i am still curious as to whether or not anyone else saw this this morning and has reported it. i still am wondering what it was i saw. i am not a ufo follower. i have a photo of this event on my phone but can not send it sorry. i can not download off my phone and well i would not know how anyway. i am 53 years old
christine phillips
content.summary: At 7am this morning two objects appeared. like bright orrange yellow flames, shortly followed by another 3

content.detailedDescription: I was in chesterfield derbyshire, leaving my parents house at about 6.30pm. i looked up into the sky & pointed out to my mother a jet & it's contrail lit up by the moonlight. just after that i saw a larger light travelling towards us high in the sky. i said to my mother that it was strange as it didn't have a strobe light or any red flashing lights. so we watched it. several jets flew by with their flashing lights & jet noises. this one light continued its journey above us silently going from west to east. as it passed over us & slightly beyond, a jet was flying toward it coming from roughly just off east.  to me at one point they were relatively close, so i believe the jet pilots would have been well aware of it. my mother & i watched it disappear into the night sky for as long as our eyes would let us.  i'm very curious to know what  travels at night  in the sky with its light visible  the whole time with no angle changes & is completely silent? the object didn't seem to be any higher than a jet & was brighter than a star, a planet or a satellite. both my mother & i were mystified.
content.summary: Just a continuos small bright light like a planes headlight travelling from west to east silently

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were leaving the m62 to go on to the m1 southbound from bradford to sheffield when we noticed a couple of hovering shiny objects when we got to the brow of the hill we noticed around 9 in total one was larger than the rest and there was one very small round one that was omitting a white light and was higher than all the others, after around 10 to 15 mins all but two disappeared then the remaining two followed
content.summary: There was one large one and around 8 smaller ones scattered around in same area, they looked like they were reflecting a glare off the sun

content.detailedDescription: My son and i had just gotten outta the car and were heading inside. we have this habit of staring up into the sky at night sometimes because we've always been interested in the whole ufo thing. he saw it and said "hey mom, look at that." i looked up and just assumed it was a passenger plane, even though the two nearest airports are quite a ways away from where we are, we just sort of brushed it off and went inside. even though i had never seen those many lights on an airplane before, we continued inside. it wasn't until sunday when i got onto facebook and saw the posting that i flashed back to what we saw. i then realized that what we saw had absolutely no sound. if my son hadn't have noticed it ( the lights were quite bright ) we never would have seen it. and i realized that it was flying awfully low to be that far away from the nearest airport. if i had to measure the distance from the ground where it was i guess i would say it was about 15 stories high. it had been raining a couple of days prior to that and it was really cloudy. we could see the formation of lights ( that flashed a bit, then stopped ) thru the clouds as it flew along at a moderate speed. we only watched it for about 20 or 30 seconds. it quietly flew/glided directly over my apt complex and i can't believe no one else saw it. there was no wind that night. and i'm in the north part of dallas and the pic was taken in oak cliff, which is in the south-ish. so it flew north to south. according to whomever posted the pic on facebook, it was taken a little before/after approximately 8pm. my son and i got out of our car around 8:10pm headed inside, so i'm guessing it was the same object. since the clouds were blocking our complete view of it we never saw the actual structured craft. only lights in a circular pattern.
content.summary: A circular object silently flew over my apartment complex under cloud cover a little after 8pm. i could only see lights in the form of a cirlce.

content.detailedDescription:
10-15 orange ���fireballs,��� appearing and disappearing and moving about in the evening sky for the last 3 nights in a row���

i have seen this almost exact scene 9 evenings over the last two years. three of these sightings were the last three nights in a row. i���m pretty certain i will see it again tomorrow. i have managed to already show three other people, much to their surprise and to my sanity. everyone is completely stunned when it actually happens as i say it will. 

here is the way it seems to go:

just after sunset, and before moon rise (it happens to be a waning full moon the last 3 nights) i can look north ��� northwest and 7 to 10 burning orange fireball like lights will appear in the sky as if turning on and reaching maximum brightness. tonight i noticed it seemed to start with one ball that, very rapidly, split into the whole group. from there it seems to change a bit from encounter to encounter. 

some of the objects will remain completely horizontally stationary and usually begin a sequential pattern of blinking once or twice, from left to right. some of the other objects might line up exactly vertical and also fade in and out sequentially. it���s not really a blink, but more like they start to ���slip,��� as they pulse. while this is happening, the stragglers seem to move around more randomly and either fade out alone or merge together before fading out. this whole first ���act��� may last 10 ��� 15 seconds and then vanish.

after 20 seconds to a few minutes, they reappear almost due north and seem to repeat the first act again. i���m guessing there is roughly 10-20 miles in between locations, but i can���t get a good fix on distance and size of the objects. 

from there, it becomes more random with the dance, but always switching between the two spots. i haven���t been able to determine a pattern, if any, yet.  it seems to happen 3-4 more times in each location as the large group of separate fireballs.

after that, the numbers seem to diminish and the time between appearances grows longer until just one ���ball��� appears every 10 min or so with a very short duration of just a second or so.

the show seems to end with a crescendo of just one fireball burning very, very brightly for one second and then the event seems to end as quietly as it all started; just as the moon begins to rise over the hill behind me about 45 minutes from the start. 

i have been able to watch this show for the last 3 nights with such regularity, that i have risked looking totally nuts and invited friends to come witness this strangeness. so far they have not let me down. everyone who has seen this is stunned and cannot believe what they are seeing with their own eyes. it defies any explanation so far. everyone leaves stating, ���wow, people will think i���m nuts if i try to explain this!��� luckily, i am 3 for 3 in the ���not nuts,��� department with those i have dragged out to witness this. i will continue to invite others nightly, until it ceases to happen. i figure that the more people i can show this too, the faster we can come up with a rational explanation of whatever this is. 

yes, i have tried to take pictures, as have my friends, but for the last few nights we all just have our phones and they just don���t do it justice. plus it all is so exciting that as we fumble to his the record button and get it into view, you really don���t want to take your own eyes off of the scene as you struggle to make sense of it all. its quite spectacular and, unfortunately, it all happens pretty rapidly. 

tomorrow morning i am headed to phoenix to buy 2 good quality video cameras and tripods with the hope that i will get at least one more good night of this amazing show to record in a couple different ways.  i���m hoping that night vision might reveal some shape other than just orange orbs / ���fireballs.���

i live in a very rural area, but i am 60 miles from luke air force base. my sensible head says that this must be some sort of secretive military project being tested in a rather remote location.  that said, it is still directly overhead, and quite blatant to those looking up in a rather populated area. if this testing were shifted 3 miles to the west, it would all happen in a desolate 60 square mile area, separated by mountains and populated with maybe 100 inhabitants.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 8 fireballs - 4 stationary blinking sequentially & 4 moving independently

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went on a helicopter ride up in big bear,ca on 10/17/2013.
were driving home back to victorville on the backside of hwy 18 at about 4:30 in the afternoon, my wife was trying to take pictures of the sun breaking over the ridge with her cell phone and her phone was dying, she had no charger with her so i started to use my phone for her. we got to a point on hwy 18 where the sun was almost just right so we decided to pull over in a turn out to take some pictures. i rolled down my window and started taking photos with my samsung galaxy note 2, at first my phone was zoomed all the way out to really get a close shot of the sun coming over the hill, to be honest it didn't seem to look good on the screen, not the picture, so i backed the zoom all the way out and started taking photos from there. i took enough pictures and we figured we would be ok and that the ones i took would work. we decided to roll up the windows and take off to head home. a foot note, the road was dead, there was no traffic that came by when we were shooting the photos, as i said my window was down, i was not shooting with a flash that i can remember, and even if i was using the flash the pictures i got were moving all over the hillside and down and forward towards us, so a flash explains nothing. i am a skeptic, but seeing is believing. i do believe that there are things out there that we cannot explain and this is going to be one that is on that list. my wife and i had absolutely no idea that these photos were captured when we were there, or believe me i would've stayed and shot video and taken more pictures, you can count on that, we discovered the photos that night laying in bed looking at them, our life is busy, by the time we got home it was dinner time so i we got home and just started taking care of that stuff and then just finished off the night with watching some tv, like i said, we discovered the pictures laying in bed that night before we went to sleep. anyway, i am looking for answers and would like to be referred to someone that can analyze these photos. there are actually 2 of these "things", in the first couple of semi blurred photos there are actually a few things going on other than just two dots, there are halos forming above one of them and there are also grey matter that forms in front of these things as well. i am hoping that you can help me or refer me to someone who can. i am going to go back out there in a week when i have some time off of work and take some more photos and hopefully get some more pictures. any help or explanation you can give me would be great. by the way, i have more pictures however your webpage only lets me load up so many. i have more available upon request.

thank you,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Did not witness event, pictures that i took with a cell phone turned up a neon green half halo that moved all ovef
